blogPost.excerpt: 😺 PH Launch KIT is an all in one product for makers, indiehackers and product owners who feel frustrated with launching on Product Hunt. 2 months on R&D, detailed 25-step launch guide, 1300+ Design Assets, exclusive community for creators and more!
blogPost.body: 😺 PH Launch KIT is an all in one product for makers, indiehackers and product owners who feel frustrated with launching on Product Hunt. 2 months on R&D, detailed 25-step launch guide, 1300+ Design Assets, exclusive community for creators and more!
blogPost.title: PH Launch KIT - Everything you need for a successful PH Launch! (Unofficial)
blogPost.author: Alex Carrey

localize.description: 😺 PH Launch KIT是一款为在Product Hunt上发布感到挫折的制造者、独立黑客和产品所有者提供的一体化产品。2个月的研发时间，详细的25步发布指南，1300+设计资产，创作者专属社区等等。
localize.tagline: 你需要的一切成功的PH启动! (非官方)

localize.description: 😺 PH Launch KIT是一款爲在Product Hunt上發佈感到挫折的製造者、獨立黑客和產品所有者提供的一體化產品。2個月的研發時間，詳細的25步發佈指南，1300+設計資產，創作者專屬社區等等。
localize.tagline: 你需要的一切成功的PH啓動! (非官方)

previous.excerpt: Polotno Studio is a design editor. Use the large library of photos and vector illustrations to create images for social media, youtube previews, covers, presentations.
previous.title: Polotno Studio - Canva-like design editor. No signups, no ads, no paywalls.

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款设计编辑器。使用大量的照片和矢量插图库，为社交媒体、youtube预览、封面、演示文稿创建图像。
localize.tagline: 类似Canva的设计编辑器。没有注册，没有广告，没有付费墙。

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款設計編輯器。使用大量的照片和矢量插圖庫，爲社交媒體、youtube預覽、封面、演示文稿創建圖像。
localize.tagline: 類似Canva的設計編輯器。沒有註冊，沒有廣告，沒有付費牆。

next.excerpt: Apart from Paperform's in-house experts, we reached out to the design community to gain insights into what makes a good form great 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful
next.title: Form Design Ebook - A comprehensive guide on why form design is critical to UX.

localize.description: 除了Paperform的内部专家外，我们还联系了设计社区，以深入了解如何使一个好的表单变得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指导为什么表单设计对用户体验至关重要。

localize.description: 除了Paperform的內部專家外，我們還聯繫了設計社區，以深入瞭解如何使一個好的表單變得更棒 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful。
localize.tagline: 全面指導爲什麼表單設計對用戶體驗至關重要。
